author: lresende
msg: Fixing namespace for json-rpc operation selector and wire format

author: baerrach
msg: [MECLIPSE-551] regression - Resources are excluded if resource dir equals source dir
- includes and excludes are now lists of Strings instead of a String separated by the | character.
- added get*AsString methods which return the eclipse formatted pattern for include and exclude.
- Moved generation of a String for the eclipse include/exclude patterns to EclipseSourceDir.
- In extractResourceDirs() the resources directories were added to the set without checking the result of the add() method.
This meant that when a resource path matched a source path the resource path was silently ignored.
Now the source directory is merged with the resource and since Eclipse doesnt have a concept of "main", "test", "resource"
This IT also uses src/main/java as a resource directory
- update classpath to include src/main/resources as the pom references this value
- added dummy file to src/main/resources so that it would be included in the .classpath

author: damien
msg: Removed unfixed tests cases accidently checked in.
